author: Special Correspondent
title: 55-year-old with SARI dies, COVID-19 reports awaited
description: A 55-year-old woman from Bantwal with Severe Acute Respiratory Illness (SARI) died at the Government Wenlock Hospital here on Sunday morning.Following SARI, the woman was shifted to the hospital where
content:
A 55-year-old woman from Bantwal with Severe Acute Respiratory Illness (SARI) died at the Government Wenlock Hospital here on Sunday morning.
Following SARI, the woman was shifted to the hospital where she was undergoing treatment since Wednesday. Her throat… [+96 chars]
